'''Sceydwin''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A pirate from [Benweth](/benweth/)'s crew, currently lashed up as a "deterrent to insubordination" for stealing one of Benweth's war horns to play a prank on [Ungwith](/ungwithTheCraghearted/)

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            =
|other           =
* You can release her from her post. She will later reward you {{cp2|250}} at [Fort Deadlight](/fortDeadlight/) after [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/).
* You can spit in her face ([Cruel](/cruel/)).
* With [Bluff](/bluff/) 7, she was once able to teach you how to use the [Deadlight Horn](/deadlightHorn/), information that you could use to lure Benweth down to the court. This has since been cut.
}}

[Category:Fort Deadlight characters](/categoryFortDeadlightCharacters/)

'''Sceydwin''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A pirate from [[Benweth]]'s crew, currently lashed up as a "deterrent to insubordination" for stealing one of Benweth's war horns to play a prank on [[Ungwith the Craghearted|Ungwith]]

==Interactions==
{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|none            =
|other           =
* You can release her from her post. She will later reward you {{cp2|250}} at [[Fort Deadlight]] after [[Blow the Man Down]].
* You can spit in her face ([[Cruel]]).
* With [[Bluff]] 7, she was once able to teach you how to use the [[Deadlight Horn]], information that you could use to lure Benweth down to the court. This has since been cut.
}}
